scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn generate && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json
scripts.build:public: yarn clean && yarn generate:public && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json
scripts.build:local: yarn clean && yarn generate:local && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json
scripts.generate: cp generator/openapitools-dev.json openapitools.json && openapi-generator-cli generate && rm openapitools.json
scripts.generate:prod: cp generator/openapitools-prod.json openapitools.json && openapi-generator-cli generate && rm openapitools.json
scripts.generate:local: cp generator/openapitools-local.json openapitools.json && openapi-generator-cli generate && rm openapitools.json
